verses.verse: When <WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath cut off<WH3772> <WH853> the nations,<WH1471> whose<WH834> <WH853> land<WH776> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee, and thou succeedest<WH3423> them, and dwellest<WH3427> in their cities,<WH5892> and in their houses;<WH1004>
Thou shalt separate<WH914> three<WH7969> cities<WH5892> for thee in the midst<WH8432> of thy land,<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee to possess<WH3423> it.

Thou shalt prepare<WH3559> thee a way,<WH1870> and divide<WH8027> <WH853> the coasts<WH1366> of thy land,<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth thee to inherit,<WH5157> into three parts, that every<WH3605> slayer<WH7523> may<WH1961> flee<WH5127> thither.<WH8033>

And this<WH2088> is the case<WH1697> of the slayer,<WH7523> which<WH834> shall flee<WH5127> thither,<WH8033> that he may live:<WH2425> Whoso<WH834> killeth<WH5221> <WH853> his neighbor<WH7453> ignorantly,<WH1907> <WH1947> whom he<WH1931> hated<WH8130> not<WH3808> in time<WH8032> past;<WH4480> <WH8657>

As when a man<WH834> goeth<WH935> into the wood<WH3293> with<WH854> his neighbor<WH7453> to hew<WH2404> wood,<WH6086> and his hand<WH3027> fetcheth a stroke<WH5080> with the axe<WH1631> to cut down<WH3772> the tree,<WH6086> and the head<WH1270> slippeth<WH5394> from<WH4480> the helve,<WH6086> and lighteth upon<WH4672> <WH853> his neighbor,<WH7453> that he die;<WH4191> he<WH1931> shall flee<WH5127> unto<WH413> one<WH259> of those<WH428> cities,<WH5892> and live: <WH2425>

Lest <WH6435> the avenger<WH1350> of the blood<WH1818> pursue<WH7291> <WH310> the slayer,<WH7523> while<WH3588> his heart<WH3824> is hot,<WH3179> and overtake<WH5381> him, because<WH3588> the way<WH1870> is long,<WH7235> and slay<WH5221> him;<WH5315> whereas he was not<WH369> worthy of death,<WH4941> <WH4194> inasmuch as<WH3588> he<WH1931> hated<WH8130> him not<WH3808> in time<WH8032> past.<WH4480> <WH8543>
Wherefore <WH5921> <WH3651> I<WH595> command<WH6680> thee, saying,<WH559> Thou shalt separate<WH914> three<WH7969> cities<WH5892> for thee.

And if<WH518> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> enlarge<WH7337> <WH853> thy coast,<WH1366> as<WH834> he hath sworn<WH7650> unto thy fathers,<WH1> and give<WH5414> thee<WH853> all<WH3605> the land<WH776> which<WH834> he promised<WH1696> to give<WH5414> unto thy fathers;<WH1>

If <WH3588> thou shalt keep<WH8104> <WH853> all<WH3605> these<WH2063> commandments<WH4687> to do<WH6213> them, which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> thee this day,<WH3117> to love<WH157> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> and to walk<WH1980> ever<WH3605> <WH3117> in his ways;<WH1870> then shalt thou add<WH3254> three<WH7969> cities<WH5892> more<WH5750> for thee, beside<WH5921> these<WH428> three: <WH7969>

That innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818> be not<WH3808> shed<WH8210> in<WH7130> thy land,<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee for an inheritance,<WH5159> and so blood<WH1818> be<WH1961> upon<WH5921> thee.

But if<WH3588> any man<WH376> hate<WH1961> <WH8130> his neighbor,<WH7453> and lie in wait<WH693> for him, and rise up<WH6965> against<WH5921> him, and smite<WH5221> him mortally<WH5315> that he die,<WH4191> and fleeth<WH5127> into<WH413> one<WH259> of these<WH411> cities: <WH5892>

Then the elders<WH2205> of his city<WH5892> shall send<WH7971> and fetch<WH3947> him thence,<WH4480> <WH8033> and deliver<WH5414> him into the hand<WH3027> of the avenger<WH1350> of blood,<WH1818> that he may die.<WH4191>

Thine eye<WH5869> shall not<WH3808> pity<WH2347> <WH5921> him, but thou shalt put away<WH1197> the guilt of innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818> from Israel,<WH4480> <WH3478> that it may go well<WH2895> with thee.

Thou shalt not<WH3808> remove<WH5253> thy neighbor's<WH7453> landmark,<WH1366> which<WH834> they of old time<WH7223> have set<WH1379> in thine inheritance,<WH5159> which<WH834> thou shalt inherit<WH5157> in the land<WH776> that<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee to possess<WH3423> it.

One <WH259> witness<WH5707> shall not<WH3808> rise up<WH6965> against a man<WH376> for any<WH3605> iniquity,<WH5771> or for any<WH3605> sin,<WH2403> in any<WH3605> sin<WH2399> that<WH834> he sinneth:<WH2398> at<WH5921> the mouth<WH6310> of two<WH8147> witnesses,<WH5707> or<WH176> at<WH5921> the mouth<WH6310> of three<WH7969> witnesses,<WH5707> shall the matter<WH1697> be established.<WH6965>
If <WH3588> a false<WH2555> witness<WH5707> rise up<WH6965> against any man<WH376> to testify<WH6030> against him that which is wrong;<WH5627>

Then both<WH8147> the men,<WH376> between whom<WH834> the controversy<WH7379> is, shall stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> before<WH6440> the priests<WH3548> and the judges,<WH8199> which<WH834> shall be<WH1961> in those<WH1992> days;<WH3117>

And the judges<WH8199> shall make diligent inquisition:<WH1875> <WH3190> and, behold,<WH2009> if the witness<WH5707> be a false<WH8267> witness,<WH5707> and hath testified<WH6030> falsely<WH8267> against his brother;<WH251>
Then shall ye do<WH6213> unto him, as<WH834> he had thought<WH2161> to have done<WH6213> unto his brother:<WH251> so shalt thou put the evil away<WH1197> <WH7451> from among<WH4480> <WH7130> you.
And those which remain<WH7604> shall hear,<WH8085> and fear,<WH3372> and shall henceforth<WH3254> commit<WH6213> no<WH3808> more<WH5750> any<WH1697> such<WH2088> evil<WH7451> among<WH7130> you.

And thine eye<WH5869> shall not<WH3808> pity;<WH2347> but life<WH5315> shall go for life,<WH5315> eye<WH5869> for eye,<WH5869> tooth<WH8127> for tooth,<WH8127> hand<WH3027> for hand,<WH3027> foot<WH7272> for foot.<WH7272>
